name: Salamangreat Recureance
text: Target 2 "Salamangreat" monsters with different names in your GY: add them to your hand. If this Set card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Salamangreat" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Salamangreat Recureance". You can only use each effect of “Salamangreat Recureance” once per turn.
